Package org.apache.cassandra.cache

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AutoSavingCache.CacheSerializer<K extends CacheKey,V>  
    AutoSavingCache.IStreamFactory  
    CacheProvider<K,V>  
    ICache<K,V>
    This is similar to the Map interface, but requires maintaining a given capacity and does not require put or remove to return values, which lets SerializingCache be more efficient by avoiding deserialize except on get.
    IMeasurableMemory  
    IRowCacheEntry  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AutoSavingCache<K extends CacheKey,V>  
    CacheKey  
    ConcurrentLinkedHashCache<K extends IMeasurableMemory,V extends IMeasurableMemory>
    Wrapper so CLHM can implement ICache interface.
    CounterCacheKey  
    InstrumentingCache<K,V>
    Wraps an ICache in requests + hits tracking.
    KeyCacheKey  
    NopCacheProvider  
    OHCProvider  
    RefCountedMemory  
    RowCacheKey  
    RowCacheSentinel
    A sentinel object for row caches.
    SerializingCache<K,V>
    Serializes cache values off-heap.
    SerializingCacheProvider
